text: Jesus Maria Visitacion Villan (born May 17, 1966 in San Sebastian) is a 7-per- team football player from Spain. He has a disability: he has cerebral palsy and is a C7 type player. He played 7-per-team football at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team finished third after they played the United States and won 2-1. He played 7-per-team football at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. His team finished 6. == References == Category:Spanish footballers Category:Living people Category:1966 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:People from San Sebastian Category:People from Guipuzcoa
title: Jesús María Visitacion Villan
